extendedInfo.description: Enjoy the full version of Frost with unlimited image stash space, the option to set a custom homepage, and no ads! Check out Frost Lite for free if you want to try before you buy.Frost is the best private tabbed web browser for Android, with a hidden, password protected image and bookmark stash as well as extensive privacy features.With Frost, you can be confident that your privacy is protected.We want to hear from you! If you feel you need to rate us below 5 stars, please contact us with your feedback or issues.Features:â Tabbed BrowsingFast, full featured tabbed browser with plugin (Flash) support, popup blocker, HTML5 video and user agent switchingâ Privacy ProtectionAutomatically clears all browsing history when you close the appâ Image & Bookmark VaultDownload images from the web and save bookmarks into a hidden, password protected stashâ Import & Export ImagesImport or export pictures between your SD card and image stash â Complete StealthFrost looks and functions like any other innocent browser, until you enter your password into the address bar, which reveals your image and bookmark stashâ Stash Protection The contents of your stash is hidden from other apps (such as gallery or camera) and not viewable when connected to a computerâ Image Gallery & ViewerThe image stash contains a gallery of all your private images, as well as a complete picture viewer with full zooming and slideshow supportâ FoldersOrganize your image stash into foldersâ Professionally DesignedPolished, simple design makes the most of your screen sizeâ Tablet supportNote: Flash support requires installing the Adobe Flash plugin, available on Google Play. Adobe does not support flash on Android 4.1+

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: I use this daily and the stashes and fave saves work really well. It does crash quite a bit but on the whole really good. The exported images can be a bit on the soft side but that may be my imagination. Download files would be a great addition.
reviews.author: RICHARD CURRIE

reviews.title: Used to be great
reviews.comment: It used to be great.  After their last update any bookmark that I selected, caused the program fail period.  I\'ve even uninstalled and reinstalled the program. But no luck.
reviews.author: Tom Baker

reviews.title: good browser for privacy
reviews.comment: good for private browsing of the internet, but no flash video support. can save images encrypted with password for later viewing which might be helpful.
reviews.author: David King

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: Does everything you could ever ask a tablet browser to do
reviews.author: Ethan Geers

reviews.title: Frost Web browser
reviews.comment: Very good.
reviews.author: Bobby L. Thomas

reviews.title: Just what I needed
reviews.comment: Awesome!

reviews.title: Outstanding app!!!
reviews.comment: The best app ever. It is worth every penny.

reviews.title: A very good app does all it says it does
reviews.comment: I\'m absolutely pleases with this app I started with the free version and just had to update really good

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Been looking for an app like this.

reviews.title: OK, but.....
reviews.comment: The app works great, but was advertised for $2.99 and $3.99 was charged to my card. Not happy about that.
reviews.author: Scott Berry

reviews.title: Superb browser
reviews.comment: Great as expected. Wish there was an image search through duck duck go though.

reviews.title: Well worth the price
reviews.comment: Excellent browser.  Better than any other I have used.

reviews.comment: Ther is no video and you can\'t edit pictures

reviews.comment: I always use this app.

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Great

reviews.comment: Galaxy s3

reviews.title: Very Good!
reviews.comment: Very nice. Definatly the best iv found. Only reason its not 5 stars is cause it likes to crash (a lot!) and you cant download files. Needs the option to copy URL!

reviews.title: Great browser!
reviews.comment: @Eric, you\'re both a noob and a douche! Go get an iPhone if you don\'t understand Android! Quit wasting these developer\'s time with futile questions and comments. My God!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best solution in then app store
reviews.comment: Feature wise, Frost can\'t be beat. Feel secure when you hand your phone or tablet to a friend.   My only request is that the UI get redesigned.
reviews.author: Doug Tammany
